definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Oxygen can be adopted as the power source in the atomizer, the atomizer is provided with strong applicability.
sentences.chinese: 本雾化器可以用氧气做动力源，适用性强。

sentences.english: Piezoelectric ceramic is used widely for ultrasonic atomizer, humidifier, medical atomizing, etc.
sentences.chinese: 用于超声波雾化器，加湿器和某些医疗器械。

sentences.english: Finally, the paper gives a brief illustrate about the applications and prospects of the atomizer.
sentences.chinese: 对雾化器的实际应用及其前景也作了一定说明。

sentences.english: This nebulizer is used in conjunction with the CYCLONE Spray Chamber. May be used with all solvents.
sentences.chinese: 同心玻璃雾化器与漩流雾室配合使用。

sentences.english: Multiple atomizers can be used to deposit the multiple materials.
sentences.chinese: 可以使用多个雾化器来沉积多种材料。

sentences.english: It is actually a battery powered atomizer which uses a Motorola chip.
sentences.chinese: 它实际上是采用雾化器的使用摩托罗拉芯片电池。

sentences.english: For Flavoring machine, nebulizer , fresh machine with special oils and other products.
sentences.chinese: 为加香机，雾化器，清新机等产品配专用精油。
什么是依思瑞的雾化器？

sentences.english: Why is an electrothermal atomizer more sensitive than a flame atomizer?
sentences.chinese: 为什么是一个电热比火焰雾化器雾化更敏感？

sentences.english: This paper introduces some simple cases of the troubleshooting of ultrasonic atomizer.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了超声雾化器的电源及出雾量故障及排除。

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
(of a magnet) to attract metallic objects/(fig.) to exert a magnetic attraction (for investment, tourists etc)
